| History                 = The Sunny Day Cleaning Supply Company had [[Sunny Day Cleaning Supply Company (Location)|a building]] in [[Shanghai]], which was being used by [[Mister Negative (Earth-616)|Mister Negative]]. Within was a drug lab manufacturing the drug [[Shade (Drug)|Shade]]. The operation was discovered by [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]] and the workers were arrested by the [[Shanghai Police Department (Earth-616)|police]].{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 4 7}} It's unknown if the company was owned by Mister Negative or if that facility was the only one being used.
